title: Static Analysis

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to connect to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to configured Wi-Fi networks.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate

Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.
Application is signed with SHA1withRSA. SHA1 hash algorithm is known to have collision issues.
Certificate algorithm might be vulnerable to hash collision

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (.TrackShutdown) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (.adbWidgetProvider) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

metadata.cwe: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to ['network connectivity'].

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has user/application initiated network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FMT_MEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke the mechanisms recommended by the platform vendor for storing and setting configuration options.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt any data in traffic or does not transmit any data between itself and another trusted IT product.

strings: "server_screenon" : "La pantalla nunca entrará en modo de suspensión"
"server_wifi_off" : "Turn off WiFi on app exit if it was off at app start"
"top_text" : "Welcome to adbWireless, you can enable or disable the wireless connection ADB interface by pressing the big button."
"server_onboot" : "Start up automatically when restart your phone"
"no_wifi" : "Ops! Sorry, but WiFi is off, you need the active WiFi to use adbWireless."
"autcon_incomplete" : "Tienes que configurar la IP y el Puerto para utilizar la auto conexión"
"top_text" : "Bienvenido a adbWireless, puedes habilitar o deshabilitar la conexión inalámbrica para ADB pulsando el gran botón."
"exit_info" : "Para cerrar la aplicación utiliza el menú Salir. Para seguir trabajando utiliza el botón de inicio."
"server_wifi_on" : "Enciende el WiFi cuando la aplicación se inicia"
"footer_text_1" : "adbWireless está encendido, desde el pc con el SDK de Android ejecuta:"
"autcon_incomplete" : "You must configure the IP and port to use auto connection"
"footer_text_1" : "adbWireless is on, from your computer with Android SDK installed run:"
"server_wifi_off" : "Apaga el WiFi al salir aplicación si estaba apagado cuando la app se inicio"
"server_onboot" : "Arranca automáticamente cuando se reinicia el teléfono"

"about" : "adbWireless enable ADB wireless connection to connect to the phone as if connected by USB.

Developed by MrSiir (mrsiir@gmail.com)

adbWirelessService:
https://github.com/MrSiir/adbWireless/tree/master/server

Source code:
https://github.com/MrSiir/adbWireless

Contributors: HandlerExploit y Skywriter"
"server_autocon" : "Connects to your computer automatically when you start ADB"

"about" : "adbWireless habilita la conexión inalámbrica de ADB para conectarse al teléfono como si estuviera conectado por USB.

Desarrollado por MrSiir (mrsiir@gmail.com)

adbWirelessService:
https://github.com/MrSiir/adbWireless/tree/master/server

Código fuente:
https://github.com/MrSiir/adbWireless

Han contribuido: HandlerExploit y Skywriter"
"no_root" : "Ops! Sorry, but your kernel does not have all necessary features for running this application, you need rooted phone."
"footer_text_3" : "And you can use ADB as if connected by USB"
"footer_text_3" : "Y ya puedes utilizar ADB como si el teléfono estuviera conectado por USB"
"server_autocon" : "Conecta automáticamente al ordenador cuando se inicia ADB"
"no_root" : "Ops! Lo sentimos pero tu kernel no tiene todas las características necesarias para el funcionamiento de esta aplicación, es necesario un teléfono rooteado."
"exit_info" : "To close the application use the Exit menu. To continue working use the home button."
"no_wifi" : "Ops! El WiFi está apagado, necesitas el WiFi activo para utilizar adbWireless."

high.title: Application vulnerable to Janus Vulnerability
high.description: Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

high.title: Certificate algorithm might be vulnerable to hash collision
high.description: Application is signed with SHA1withRSA. SHA1 hash algorithm is known to have collision issues.

warning.title: Application Data can be Backed up
warning.description:
[android:allowBackup=true]
This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.

warning.title: Broadcast Receiver (.TrackShutdown) is not Protected.
warning.description:
An intent-filter exists.
A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.

warning.title: Broadcast Receiver (.adbWidgetProvider) is not Protected.
warning.description:
An intent-filter exists.
A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.
